Detailed Description

This is the OS Adaptation Layer used by the PDK Utilities primarily for instantiating interrupt functions for the ARM platform while profiling is running.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define profiling_osalAssert (   expr)    OSAL_Assert(expr)

Assert API. If expression is true then it will stay in the while loop.

Parameters
exprExpression which need to be evaluated.
#define profiling_osalHardwareIntDestruct (   X)    (HwiP_delete(X))

Function to deregister a interrupt.

Prototype: The following is the C prototype for the expected OSAL API.

    int HwiOSAL_deregisterInterrupt(void* hwiPtr)

Parameter
Interrupt handler

Return Value
status of operation

#define profiling_osalHardwareIntDisable ( )    (HwiP_disable())

Function to disable interrupts to enter a critical region.

Prototype: The following is the C prototype for the expected OSAL API.

    void HwiOSAL_enterCritical()

Parameter
Not Applicable

Return Value
Interrupt key

#define profiling_osalHardwareIntrDisable (   X)    (HwiP_disableInterrupt(X))

Function to disable specific hardware interrupt.

Prototype: The following is the C prototype for the expected OSAL API.

    void HwiOSAL_disableInterrupt(uint32_t intrNum)

Parameter
Interrupt number

#define profiling_osalHardwareIntrEnable (   X)    (HwiP_enableInterrupt(X))

Function to enable specific hardware interrupt.

Prototype: The following is the C prototype for the expected OSAL API.

    void HwiOSAL_enableInterrupt(uint32_t intrNum)

Parameter
Interrupt number

#define profiling_osalHardwareIntRestore (   X)    (HwiP_restore(X))

Function to restore interrupts to exit a critical region.

Prototype: The following is the C prototype for the expected OSAL API.

    void HwiOSAL_exitCritical(int key)

Parameter
Interrupt key

Return Value
Not Applicable

#define profiling_osalHwiParamsInit (   X)    (HwiP_Params_init(X))

Function to initialize hardware interrupt parameters.

Prototype: The following is the C prototype for the expected OSAL API.

    void HwiP_Params_init(X)

Parameter
params pointer to the hardware interrupts parameter structure

#define profiling_osalRegisterInterrupt (   X,
  Y,
  Z 
)    (HwiP_create((X),(Y),(Z)))

Function to register an interrupt.

Prototype: The following is the C prototype for the expected OSAL API.

    int HwiOSAL_registerInterrupt(X,Y,Z,U,V)

Parameter
Interrupt number

Parameter
eventID

Parameter
entry entry function of the hardware interrupt

Parameter
arg argument passed into the entry function

Parameter
priority

Return Value
Interrupt handler

#define profiling_osalSemParamsInit (   params)    (SemaphoreP_Params_init(params))

Initialize params structure to default values.

The default parameters are:

  • mode: SemOSAL_Mode_COUNTING
  • name: NULL
Parameters
paramsPointer to the instance configuration parameters.

Typedef Documentation

typedef void* HwiP_Handle

Opaque client reference to an instance of a HwiP.

A HwiP_Handle returned from the HwiP_create represents that instance.

typedef struct HwiP_Params_s HwiP_Params

Basic HwiP Parameters.

Structure that contains the parameters passed into ::HwiP_create when creating a HwiP instance. The ::HwiP_Params_init function should be used to initialize the fields to default values before the application sets the fields manually. The HwiP default parameters are noted in HwiP_Params_init.

typedef void* SemaphoreP_Handle

Opaque client reference to an instance of a SemaphoreP.

A SemaphoreP_Handle returned from the SemaphoreP_create represents that instance and is used in the other instance based functions (e.g. SemaphoreP_post or SemaphoreP_pend, etc.).

typedef struct SemaphoreP_Params_s SemaphoreP_Params

Basic SemaphoreP Parameters.

Structure that contains the parameters are passed into SemaphoreP_create when creating a SemaphoreP instance. The SemaphoreP_Params_init function should be used to initialize the fields to default values before the application sets the fields manually. The SemaphoreP default parameters are noted in SemaphoreP_Params_init.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum SemaphoreP_Status_e

Status codes for SemaphoreP APIs.

Enumerator
SemaphoreP_OK 

API completed successfully

SemaphoreP_FAILURE 

API failed

SemaphoreP_TIMEOUT 

API failed because of a timeout
